subject: Florida Lakefront Opportunity

Come Visit Grand Oaks on Lake Damon, a brand new waterfront community in Avon Park, Florida.  
Are you looking for Florida waterfront lifestyle in an upscale gated community at an affordable price?  
If so, Grand Oaks on Lake Damon is for you!

Featuring:

Lakefront, Lakeview and Interior Lots available from $45,000 - $199,000.
Private Community Access to Crystal Clear Lake Damon
Private Community Pool and Recreation Area
Lot Financing Available (Click for details)
Desirable Central Florida Location (Approx. 1hr from Disney)













Central Florida Lakefront Property
